Output.SqlQuery: SELECT root["id"] AS Key, root["id"] AS key FROM root GROUP BY root["id"]

Input.Description: GroupBy Multi Value Select Key and Constant
Input.Expression: query.GroupBy(k => k.Id, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(KeyAlias = key, values = 123))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT root["id"] AS KeyAlias, 123 AS values FROM root GROUP BY root["id"]

Input.Expression: query.GroupBy(k => k.Id, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(Min = values.Min(value => value.Int), Max = values.Max(value => value.Int), Avg = values.Average(value => value.Int), Count = values.Count()))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT MIN(root["Int"]) AS Min, MAX(root["Int"]) AS Max, AVG(root["Int"]) AS Avg, COUNT(1) AS Count FROM root GROUP BY root["id"]

Input.Description: GroupBy Multi Value With Property Ref and Aggregate
Input.Expression: query.GroupBy(k => k.FamilyId, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(familyId = key, familyIdCount = values.Count()))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT root["FamilyId"] AS familyId, COUNT(1) AS familyIdCount FROM root GROUP BY root["FamilyId"]

Input.Description: GroupBy Multi Value With Aggregate On Root
Input.Expression: query.GroupBy(k => k.Id, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(Min = values.Min(), Max = values.Max()))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT MIN(root) AS Min, MAX(root) AS Max FROM root GROUP BY root["id"]

Input.Expression: query.GroupBy(k => k.Id, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(valueSelect = values.Select(value => value.Int), valueOrderBy = values.OrderBy(f => f.FamilyId)))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT r0 AS keyAlias, COUNT(1) AS count FROM ( SELECT VALUE root["id"] FROM root) AS r0 GROUP BY r0

Input.Expression: query.Select(x => new AnonymousType(Id1 = x.Id, family1 = x.FamilyId, childrenN1 = x.Children)).GroupBy(k => k.Id1, (key, values) => new AnonymousType(keyAlias = key, count = values.Count()))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT x0 AS keyAlias, COUNT(1) AS count FROM root JOIN x0 IN root["Children"] GROUP BY x0
